text: "Ignition (Remix)" is a song by R&B; singer R. Kelly. It was released as a single in 2003. It peaked at number two in the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 and number one in the UK Singles Chart. It also peaked at number one in some other countries. The song has been received quite well and was a commercial success. It is ranked as one of the best songs ever by Rolling Stone. Category:2003 songs Category:R. Kelly songs Category:R&B; music
title: Ignition (Remix)
